summary: data on infections in England and Wales from 1989 to 2014 were extracted from the public health England SGSS surveillance database. each organism’s time series was forecasted using the TBATS package in R, with seasonality detected using model fit statistics. additional file 2: (34.8KB, csv) Table S1. Weekly, monthly and quarterly breakdown of pathogen seasonality. additional file 3: (397.8KB, png) Figure S2. Mean cross correlations for weather Groups.
